intro: Psychotria turrubarensis, commonly known as the Turrubares Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central America, particularly found in Costa Rica and Panama. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests. Psychotria turrubarensis is often found growing along stream banks and in moist, well-drained soils.
